author: Nintendo of America
description:
Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 is available now on the Nintendo Switch system: https://ninten.do/6005sWmUb

Travel the galaxy with Mario in two classic adventures! With enhanced resolution, improved UI, extra Storybook Chapters, a new Assist Mode, and more, Super Mario Galaxy and Super Mario Galaxy 2 are now out of this world!

The games will also be individually available on Nintendo eShop. Additionally, a free update that adds 4K resolution support* and mouse controls for the second player will be available for Nintendo Switch 2.

*TV and game must be compatible with 4K resolution. Frame rates are capped at 60 fps for 4K output.Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America

title: Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 — Launch Trailer — Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
The Pokémon Legends: Z-A game launches October 16, 2025, exclusively on the Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch systems. Pre-orders are available now on Nintendo eShop:
https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/pokemon-legends-z-a-nintendo-switch-2-edition-switch-2

An adventure across Lumiose City is about to begin! Whether you’re a die-hard Pokémon fan
or about to toss your first Poké Ball, Pokémon Legends: Z-A has plenty to offer for Trainers of all types. Catch, battle, and Mega Evolve—all in real time—and aim to become the strongest Pokémon Trainer in town!

Nintendo Switch 2 players who have Pokémon Legends: Z-A on Nintendo Switch can upgrade to Nintendo Switch 2 Edition by purchasing the upgrade pack.

#NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition — Overview Trailer
